title: It's sad how many people actually believe these advanced bots are actually bots...
body:
I had more hope for the world, I was a fool...

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Welcome to people!!

You'll find a lot of them in your journeys.
I actually think that's funnier than it's sad
Honestly tho, I knew from the start. All I did was show my mastery in lane to see if they showed back, and when they did I instantly knew it was a real person.
I had three people ask me this and all of them were playing Yasuo.
You're not a fool, you're just programmed that way.
